item.title: ALIT
item.description: score:52 Chances: Alight Inc has signed a significant agreement to sell its Professional Services segment and its Payroll & HCM Outsourcing businesses, which could result in a positive financial impact. The company has been making strategic moves to strengthen its technology and enhance competitiveness, as stated by CEO Stephan Scholl.
